name: Spell Dash
summary: Spell Dash features 3 electrifying game modes that will keep you coming back for more. Arcade Mode: Find words quickly to clear the board before the letters reach the top. Timeless Mode: Play at your own relaxing pace. Be careful though, new letters will drop every time you find a word! Blitz Mode: Find words quickly before the clock runs out. Charge the frenzy meter to gain impressive bonuses and power-ups.
